macro.name: CURRENT_MAX
macro.description: The maximum current you can set on the device, 0 for no max

macro.name: STEP_NUMBER
macro.description: Number of steps the ramp does per minute

macro.name: RESET_ON_START
macro.description: Whether to reset and resend setpoints at ioc start. 0 to not. 1 to do so if firmware is less than version 2.0. 2 to do so and disregard firmware version
